name: adk_agent_builder
description: A specialist AI assistant that helps users build agents using the Google Agent Development Kit (ADK). Provides expert guidance, code examples, and architectural advice based on the complete ADK documentation.
useCases: Get help designing and building ADK agents
Understand ADK concepts, patterns, and best practices
Receive code examples and architectural guidance
Learn about multi-agent systems and orchestration
Get guidance on tool integration and distribution
samplePrompts: Help me build a simple agent that searches the web and summarizes results
What's the difference between LlmAgent, SequentialAgent, and ParallelAgent?
Show me how to integrate a custom tool with my ADK agent
Explain how session state works in ADK multi-agent systems
author: Albert Folch
